title: AI and IDEs: Walking Through How JetBrains Is Approaching AI
author: David Eastman
description: We test out JetBrains AI, a new multi-LLM AI assistant for its collection of integrated development environments (IDE).
cntitle: AI 与 IDE：探索 JetBrains 对 AI 的应用
cndescription: 我们测试了 JetBrains AI，这是一款针对其集成开发环境 (IDE) 集合的新型多语言模型 AI 助手。
